snippet: Renée Fleming performed selections from “Dark Hope,” Broadway songs and other works with the Orpheus Chamber Orchestra and Josh Groban in a “Live From Lincoln Center” program.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of rock and Broadway songs performed by soprano Renee Fleming, accompanied by the Orpheus Chamber Orchestra and pop singer Josh Groban, at the Stanley H Kaplan Penthouse at Lincoln Center.
lead_paragraph: Renée Fleming performed selections from “Dark Hope,” Broadway songs and other works with the Orpheus Chamber Orchestra and Josh Groban in a “Live From Lincoln Center” program.

headline.seo: Renée Fleming With Orpheus Chamber Orchestra
headline.main: A Diva Dips Into Indie Rock and Musical Theater
headline.print_headline: A Diva Dips Into Indie Rock and Musical Theater
